lenders.name: DEM2
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other earthlings that are working hard to better the lives of themselves, their family, and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a grain of sand on the beach. Trying to make a difference.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is nice knowing I can do something to change someone else's life.

lenders.name: Toni and Cliff
lenders.loan_because: Everything I ever needed to know about life I learned in Kindergarden...#1...Share!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am a very fortunate person and I believe that good fortune obligates me to try to help others out. It's all about karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a communications company that specializes in helping authors get publicity.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: Being so little I can relate to the idea that small things can have a big impact.  And, I believe I'm bound for greatness, and I realize I'll get a lot of help along the way to make the most of my potential. So I figured I'd start giving back early.  Positive intentions hopefully will create some good karma down the road.  Lastly, I loan because my Mum & Dad want me to be mindful of others around me and to find ways to help improve the world I live in.
lenders.occupational_info: Mummy says my main job is to be "nice, cute and happy". Which is pretty easy to do most of the time as long as I'm fed and have a clean diaper. And I help my Mum & Dad keep their perspective about what's important in the long run.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting and empowering people. Rewarding!

lenders.name: Brantley
lenders.occupational_info: I seek out opportunities to learn something new very day and share what I have learned with others.  These experiences have proven to be key in my growth both personally and professionally.  I am often challenged with problems that require me to develop solutions that appear unconventional, but this is what makes me creative, unique and identifiable.

lenders.name: Marybeth
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful organization that allows me to feel like I can help someone else in a small way.  Usually I might give money but I don't know how it is used, this is specific and lets me make decisions on where my money goes and to whom it goes to.
lenders.occupational_info: I do a bit of everything from data base management to teaching children fire safety.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a shot!
lenders.occupational_info: We clean and restore high-end chandeliers in the Los Angeles area....

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 11 years old and am in grade 6.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: What a great thing to do... Help Someone
lenders.occupational_info: We have a small Imprinted Sportswear business in Virginia

lenders.name: Lucy and Bill
lenders.loan_because:
We're lucky to have our health, a good roof over our  heads, and  happy lives.
We hope this can make a difference for someone else.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 10 years old and am in Grade five.

lenders.name: LYNN
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mother on welfare with 3 children and no one to help me
lenders.occupational_info: I CREATE BEAUTIFUL HOMES FOR PEOPLE

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner in the US, I've been afforded many opportunities for success. I want to share that success by helping enable small businesses in other areas to grow and flourish.
lenders.occupational_info: I design print and interactive advertising for small-to-midsize businesses.

lenders.name: gerry grand bend canada
lenders.loan_because: wonderful xmas gift from Kara , Geoff, Laurie Ann,Jake and Lucie

lenders.name: Road Angels
lenders.loan_because: I'm humbled to know that i can, in a small way, help people across the world gain economic independence and maybe even help achieve their lifelong dreams.

lenders.name: Celestine
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate that I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
I can.  

KIVA is a great way to help people help themselves!

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting women in developing countries who are trying to start/continue/build their own businesses in order to support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the students, staff, and parents in an elementary school of 450 low-income students.

lenders.name: Ileene
lenders.loan_because: I can and my life is blessed
lenders.occupational_info: Assistant to the director of  the  world recognized University Of Texas /Center For Space Research involved in Earth Sciences and environmentally sensitive & beneficial science

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: As a citizen of our global community, I feel this is one of the best ways I can make a positive contribution to support  it.
lenders.occupational_info: I make and teach the making of music. I am a musician, composer and university professor. I study the music of all cultures and strive to find identify the similarities and uniqueness between them.

lenders.name: phillip Wister
lenders.loan_because: I want others in the world to know Americans and not the United States.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sort out their problems with a kind heart and keen ear.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I think people should help each other out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and theater actor in New York City and New England.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: This type of investment is too good to pass up.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for geographic information systems (maps and imagery).

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell internet equipment to the US Government

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my way of paying forward all that has been given to me, it feels good to know you helped a person or family get ahead and to know blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time Mom, student, and future teacher for elementary age children.

lenders.name: Carol Dean
lenders.loan_because: I can. I am blessed to be able to do what I love without having to support myself doing it. I also believe that you can't receive things in life if you aren't giving them as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend hours weaving tiny beads together to create beautiful adornments.

lenders.name: adewale
lenders.loan_because: iam a farmer i produce fish feeds and also have small fish farm , i need a loan of $1200 to buy big machine and expand my fish farm
lenders.occupational_info: my work is very demanding and interesting, i believe the loan will make me employ labours and increase my feeds production in order to meet daily demands

lenders.name: Ghen
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing way to be of service to someone who will make an impact on his/her part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am called a pencil head, a pencil pusher, a bean counter, but what I actually do is keep assets secure for the company and its board of directors, debtors, and shareholders.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: To start or expand a business enables someone to provide for themselves, their family, and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a community college teaching language arts to non-native speakers of English.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are willing to work hard to help themselves.  I'm fortunate enough to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an attorney and work with American Indian tribes.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: As a citizen of the earth I want to do good. God has blessed me with a little extra money and others should have the opportunity to improve their lives with these blessings as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization whose motto is: "Feeding the world through responsible aquaculture." We work to ensuring that there will be enough seafood to feed everyone by promoting safe aquaculture practices.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money to give. But together we can make a big impact. I think about the Japanese proverb: "Even dust, if accumulated, will become a mountain."

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: We're making a  difference thanks to Kiva. Seedlings of prosperity are reaching those in need.

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed with opportunities in my life which allow me to help others.

lenders.name: Aaron Krowne
lenders.loan_because: grassroots capitalism is the only legitimate kind
lenders.occupational_info: i am a commentator and activist of political economy, as well as a "technologist"

lenders.name: Donal
lenders.loan_because: as an individual I may not get a chance to change the course of history, but I can change the course of a family's history.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a computer to create beautiful images, help businesses prosper, and teach others how to create their own artwork.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being involved in microlending and social entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others make a difference in their own lives and in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy things from people who no longer want them and sell them to people who do want them, on eBay. I also teach others how to start their own business selling on eBay.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: I want people that are having hard times to know that there are people all over the world that care about them.  I think that and the money is a good thing :)
lenders.occupational_info: I protect and serve the public..by inforce laws and helping people with body aches and pains too.  I am a voice for animals being neglected or abused as well.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am a self-employed woman and I want to support other women entrepreneurs.  I have seen the success of micro-lending and I want to be a part of it.  And - it feels good!  I urge my friends to join me.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the right to a chance at seeing their dream come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish and Portuguese language, literature, and culture to University of Minnesota students.

lenders.name: scorpiovixen2006
lenders.loan_because: helping others makes a difference no matter how much you give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mommy.  That is my most important and fulfilling job.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: The impact of a small $25 loan can change  someone's life.  The rewards are countless!

lenders.name: marc
lenders.loan_because: Those who are more fortunate than others should share the wealth; you can't take it with you.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell food products imported from Germany into the U.S. market

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: people need help. What I really like is that a relatively small amount of money can help a lot in some parts of the world.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas.  I hope it helps somebody to become successful in a small business!
lenders.occupational_info: I educated people on how to use the information in their companies' computer systems.

lenders.name: Cliff
lenders.loan_because: I care about helping other people on this planet be independent, creative, and free.
lenders.occupational_info: hunting, catching, and selling wild Alaska salmon

lenders.name: Perry
lenders.loan_because: I have a soft spot for anyone who works to deliver the goodness of bacon and/or alcohol throughout the world. Furniture makers and people working on bicycles are high on the list of favorites. I also try to show the places America has done less than her best that at least some of us are interested in making amends.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a software quality engineer, working for a company that makes test and measurement equipment.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Giving a fellow human being the tools to begin a small business is much more valuable than a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: i work with business and local government to help, in a small way, to create a sustainable society.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers a unique and effective way to help people who are working with dignity to overcome hardships that are not of their own making.  With love, I "cast my bread upon the water"... it comes back to me...and I send it out again.  The impact of collective small gifts  is breath-taking!
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach English as a Second Language  to persons from all over the world at the local community college.
 
 I also substitute   in elementary schools where children from many countries attend.

lenders.name: cliff538
lenders.loan_because: To love my neighbor!
lenders.occupational_info: I fly airplanes and commercial fish for salmon.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: It is important to tangibly love others the way Jesus loves me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother of three young children and the wife of a pastor (whom I love deeply).

lenders.name: Katherine Aaron
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to demonstrate love - both for myself (because it feels good) and for others (because it assists them on their journey).
lenders.occupational_info: I channel Guidance who bring clarity from the perspective of your Highself called Channeled Life Readings. I do energywork & mind-body-spirit consultations, too. My degrees are in naturopathic medicine and counseling. A portion of my income supports KIVA and several other wonderful non-profits.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: marlene
lenders.loan_because: Luke is my grandson and we do this together. I do it because we are lucky in Australia and it's a small thing to do that makes a huge difference to someone not so lucky. It teaches Luke to be generous and that it feels good to give to others, even people that you don't know.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves and their families have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make very special dolls which I designed and copyrighted.  They are called Inspiration dolls because they are meant to inspire and give comfort and healing to their recipient.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people make a go of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide psychiatric treatment to people with severe mental illness, many of whom are homeless.

lenders.name: Sarita
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children.

lenders.name: Saskia
lenders.loan_because: I too have my own business and I want to help others to have successful businesses of their own, especially in places where it is more difficult to do so than in the United States. I want to help improve other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I use acupressure (Traditional Chinese Medicine), aromatherapy (essential oils), and Bach flowers (English emotional remedies) to improve the lives of horses.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in Canada with good health and happiness, I like to help others when possible

lenders.name: Jolie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who work hard at improving their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is school - learning stuff.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 4th grade in a fairly large city.  I teach math, english, social studies, science and writing.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: True to the cliché, I want to "make the world a smaller place".  And I think small yet meaningful contributions can change the world--or at least the world of one person.  And that's important.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing and research writing instruction, theories of writing, and all the sorts of ways in which we make meaning in our culture.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Michael Milken stated it better than I ever could when he said "I came to realize that civil rights meant more than where you could sit on a bus, or eat lunch, or attend school. It also encompassed the chance to start a business and succeed or fail on your own merit."

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: It's a small world.  We are all a big neighborhood and I believe in neighbors helping neighbors.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage large technology projects that build new online products for our customers.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a smaller and  happier  place. Also to pay tribute to my mother that has recently passed. I was taught that social justice and compassion will make me a better man.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to make people smile.

lenders.name: Payton
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I'm helping other people .

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: i want to be part some ones life in a good way and this is one way i can. It's my way of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Graduating Highschool in 2013.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I have the money sitting in a savings account anyway, why not put it to good use!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a doula :)
I provide emotional, physical and informational support to women during pregnancy and birth so that they can have an empowered and positive birth experience.

lenders.name: Murph
lenders.loan_because: I would like to assist others who are attempting to grow...

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: It's easy and it lifts some one off their feet
lenders.occupational_info: I learn

lenders.name: Lara
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and appreciate the ongoing need for capital investment to move forward.

lenders.name: Kirstan
lenders.loan_because: Peace in our world can only be achieved when each person can provide for themselves and have a little stability and control over their future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small school for 15 to 19 year olds. Not all of our students have had the most stable lives so far. We teach and learn as a community and try to teach not only the acedemic basics but also the humanitarian basics.

lenders.name: Jan Ragnar
lenders.loan_because: I got this Kiva loan-thing as a gift certificate for Chirtmas, and I was very pleaced. So no I can help in giving a loan. Thats nice.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a assistant professor i fine arts and drama at Telemark University College in Norway. My main job is to educate preschoolteachers to work in cindergardens with smal children.

lenders.name: Coghan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in need, but I don't like giving just for a handout because I don't think that helps a person to grow and feel good about themselves.  I feel giving with the idea that it may help someone to create more wealth in their lives will create more wealth in my own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have become unhappy or discouraged to find their inner strength and learn to love themselves and feel good about themselves again so that they can attain prosperity and happiness.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: i feel i need to give back what i was given and by that i mean i want to help as many people as i can.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: i'm fortunate to live a great life in a great place and simply want to pass this blessing on to others and increase development throughout the world
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student aspiring to work in international public health

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.occupational_info: I do accounting for a huge company that treats me like crap.  At nights I work as a coach and fighter competing in Jiu-Jitsu and MMA.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to have so many luxuries.  This is a great way to really make a difference in our world and to help others who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently graduated and obtained a bachelor of science degree in Speech Communication with a concentrtion in Public Relations.

lenders.name: Andres
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a break, I hope to contribute  so that others can make a more significant contribution to their families and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a Kinder to Secondary (2 to 18 year old) School in Mexico city. I teach the older students

lenders.name: John & Jolene
lenders.loan_because: I learned about these programs during a JustFaith experience and I believe they are quite benficial. I want to help my brothers and sisters.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mediator and work to implement restorative justice practices while getting communities to support juvenile offenders as they return to community.

lenders.name: ELUNED
lenders.loan_because: poverty affects everyone no matter where you live
lenders.occupational_info: customer service for publications

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: the smallest action makes the biggest difference.

lenders.name: Sumner McKenzie
lenders.loan_because: What a cool way to assist others in building their business!
lenders.occupational_info: We do all things computer - John McKenzie sets up computer systems, helps people troubleshoot problems and creates databases while Chaela Sumner designs web sites, flyers, brocures, business cards and ads.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a project manager for a company that rebuilds roads and bridges.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I hope to give the chance of following ones dream.

lenders.name: Cathie
lenders.loan_because: I want small business owners to have a head start and get the products they need to produce income
lenders.occupational_info: Service to families by taking care of their children

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a little bit of help getting started. I have been very fortunate in business and want to "pay it forward".

lenders.name: Rico
lenders.loan_because:
I've been fortunate to have the opportunity to get an education and earn a decent living.  It is a pleasure to be part of such a helpful organization.  

The mere mention of global poverty intimidates people.  We think that the problem is too big and hopeless.  

It's organizations like Kiva that empower us as individuals so that we make the right choice, and do what we can to help.  As many, we are strong.  Microlending plays a key role in ending poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a popular internet search engine.

lenders.name: KINDALL
lenders.loan_because: Help make a difference for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a bank and help customers get a loan to buy a home.

lenders.name: Robert and Jo
lenders.loan_because: We've spent much time in the developing countries and have wanted to help in other tangible ways. With Kiva, we feel we have a structure that works and is accountable.
lenders.occupational_info: We have spent time teaching journalism and design in Namibia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Singapore, Malaysia, India, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Bhutan, Pakistan, Borneo.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I believe that when you give, it will come back to you or your family.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate family team meetings for children who have lived most of their lives in foster or group homes and are being adopted or going to live with a family member or fic-of kin.

lenders.name: Marcy
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough that I can, and I like to share my little bit of prosperity with those for whom it will make a substantial difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Charley
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed beyond measure and believe in "paying it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a consultant in the entertainment pyrotechnics (fireworks) industry. I'm also active in community preservation and protection.

lenders.name: DAVID
lenders.loan_because: I was very impressed with what I saw on Public Broadcasting in the States.  I was once upon a time a VISTA/Peace Corps volunteer.  Originally going to Nicaragua, but in 1978 there was "political unrest".  I ended up staying in the States in VISTA.  I am very interested in working with the world.  It's the only way!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of a world-wide company that is involved with Advertising and Packaging.  I've worked with many people from many countries.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do!  To help someone else who is trying to make a living for themselves and their family is a small thank you for the peace in my life.

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help people not only get on their feet, but keep them standing. That is what makes Kiva cool: you know that your loan is going to help support people into the future.

lenders.name: Daisy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people making a living in their country.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint porcelain objects, from small boxes to whole dinner sets. I use mineral colors and 24 K gold and fire to make the piece permanent.

lenders.name: Heather Whinna
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: Independent Filmmaker

lenders.name: Mark & Laura
lenders.loan_because: For the love of Jesus Christ

lenders.name: BEMARIS
lenders.loan_because: We are three ladies who meet for lunch once a month.  We would like to make  a difference in someone's life since we are all three blessed in ours.
lenders.occupational_info: We are two volunteers (Marilyn and Chris) and an employee (Becky) of the Humane Society Boulder Valley.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: Ii like to give back
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed in this life and would like to share my blessings with others who with a helping hand can rise up out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a small high school working with many wonderful young people, some of whom struggle with poverty. My husband and I also own two small businesses so we know how difficult it is to start and maintain a business. We want to help other entrepreneurs around the world.

lenders.name: Elle
lenders.loan_because: I believe that individuals who are willing to try to better themselves should be given an opportunity to earn a better life.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I want to help to improve other people's lives.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: It feels good

lenders.name: Jesús
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows less favoured people to grow on their own merits. It generates real value in their countries and it is almost effortless for the contributors.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of the brand marketing teams at a worldwide known US company in Spain and Portugal.

lenders.name: Gay
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who haven't had the luck to be born in a rich country, have two parents or just not had the opportunities I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to teenagers - great kids who keep me on my toes!

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help spread prosperity in order to help foster a more stable world for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop commercial scale solar energy projects for the federal government, especially the Dept of Defense.

lenders.name: Norm
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's clients are looking for a helping hand, not a handout.  It's good for me and hopefully good for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I help robots and computers work and play together.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and learn so I can prepare for college. I plan on becoming a biologist.

lenders.name: Antje
lenders.loan_because: small entrepreneurs need working capital and banks no longer provide it.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the top down method as used by the World Bank and others simply does not work very well.  The despots that run most of these contries steal at least a lions share.  I do believe that if you help people by providing them with the ability to build their wealth and confidence then, eventually, they may well demand and receive better governance from their leaders.

lenders.name: Kristian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting people all over the world who are hard working, driven, and doing everything they can to improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that provides major funding for education and medical research.

lenders.name: Cyndee
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can help others who happen to be born into less fortunate circumstances than I.  Life is nothing without contributions to humanity and service to others.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: Its a way to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Non-profit

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: Recently my son and his wife donated some Kiva credit, in my name, as a Christmas present.  I have inturned loaned it out to two business groups.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired but was a Banker for over 30 years. My business was to  lend money to people and businesses to help purchase property and equipment.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: It's neat to help out others reach a goal that they have set for themselves and grow their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the courtroom with law enforcment to punish those who choose to break the law.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: The reward of giving is such a tremendous reward,

lenders.name: Debbie & David
lenders.loan_because: We have great respect for those who have to struggle more in life than we do. It means a lot to us to give people the power to have control over their lives in a manner that also is worthy of respect. Our help is very humble. Any joy it can help bring to another being is a joy to us. We live for our children, the same as those who need our assistance.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people helping themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing

lenders.name: Janelle and Godwill
lenders.loan_because: The little that we have in this world should be shared, and the blessing we recieve should be treasured.
lenders.occupational_info: I screen the health of those who are trying to donate plasma.  My husband works with those who have substance abuse addictions.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help those with the ambition and drive but with no means.  Everyone can make a difference.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I have made my living as an entrepreneur and know that with help others can have my same success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am writing a book right now called "Setting Our Hearts Right:  Personal Choices about Energy and the Environment".  I am not as pretty or as young as Abi whose picture I have included in my profile. She is a racehorse I saved from death after she got injured. She is one of the many joys of my life.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I care and respect others who want to make a difference in this world and they're families.

lenders.occupational_info: Retired as a U.S. Naval Officer and military engineer after 40 years.

lenders.name: raelene and jose

lenders.name: Adrienne

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and I want people who are not as fortunate as me to be happy. They deserve better and im happy i can help them in this way.

lenders.name: Edwina
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's my duty as a Christian to take a portion of what I have been blessed with to help someone else. My 20 year career in the US Air Force afforded me the opportunity to visit and live in several third world countries and I know for certain that without programs such as KIVA, many people in these countries will never get the chance to experience entrepreneurship and will remain in poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a contractor employee on a US military base.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: A few less lattes, change someone's life.....priceless.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a wonderful surgeon, taking care of patients in my community.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life with such a small effort.   I want to enable someone to make their life better, and to make their community stronger

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I rent photo booths for private events like weddings.

lenders.name: Vinnie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good make a little effort for a good cause. I believe in business.

lenders.name: Sophie

lenders.name: Staci

lenders.name: Jillian

lenders.name: ANSC

lenders.occupational_info:
The four of us met while working at Asians for Miracle Marrow Matches (A3M), a nonprofit that works to find bone marrow matches for those in need. 

Now we are all working in different jobs.  Collectively we work for Los Angeles Unified School District, Stanford University, St. Baldrick's Foundation and the Little Tokyo Service Center

lenders.loan_because: This isn't charity, it's support for small businesses.  And small businesses are the backbone of the economy.
lenders.occupational_info: that no family be left behind

lenders.name: Edmund

lenders.name: Lisa

It feels great to know you are making a difference and changing the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: It is a joy to do so.

lenders.name: The Plata Family

lenders.name: Kheaven Lee
lenders.loan_because: I want peace in the world

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It's helpful.
lenders.occupational_info: I build an online community for university students.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurial people in developing countries to create their own future.  I love to travel to developing countries and this is a great way to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with the ups and downs of the stock market every day.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: These loans are not a handout, they are a "leg up".

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: it should be done.  Cliché I know but people need a help up not a hand out.  I only wish more people in the world were like these people; attempting to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I sub high school and middle school occasionally and when I'm not doing that I'm writing papers on history topics.

lenders.name: laura

lenders.name: Fred & Gloria
lenders.loan_because: To help others

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: As a young child we were very poor and many times my family ate only because others helped us.   I have not forgotten those days and though I am not rich, I am not poor, and want to help others move forward in life as I have been helped.  I  believe true wealth is in the heart and deposits are made in this bank when helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals who are aged or disabled and help them get more money for food and medicine.

lenders.name: Annemarie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work and need financial assistance
lenders.occupational_info: I make sculptures using recycled material.

lenders.name: L

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: I've received so much. Now it is time to give.

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: I help people become better leaders.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: Such as nice and easy way to make the difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Glenn n Damaris
lenders.occupation: Fast Food, Ice Crean n Pizza Biz
lenders.loan_because:
.
We can so we should..........
lenders.occupational_info:
.
It is twenty four + years now being self employed in the food industry.

I am happy I followed thru n fulfilled a childhood dream of being the "ice cream man". However, candidly,  I am un happy that I did not move on to other bigger, better, more challenging n rewarding things.

Now at the age of 58, I now realize I am a "one trick pony". 

However,

I do truly realize that it is better to be a one trick pony than a NO Trick Pony.......
.

lenders.name: Calvin
lenders.loan_because:
I am always a proponent of "teaching someone to fish rather than giving them the fish". I am intrigued by the Kiva idea and am excited to have the opportunity to help someone who has a dream, a plan, and the determination to become econmically independent. I dream about the world will one day be rid of poverty. I support any mean that will help us achieve this goal. Anyone who has the will to improve their standard of living deserves a chance, a helping hand, and a lot of love.

In addition, I will take great interest to see if I can make a good investor - by counting my repaid loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I make use of information through computer systems and programming.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: With the risk so small, and the potential to help so great, who could resist the opportunity to help others and make the world a better place?
lenders.occupational_info: Our university-affiliated projects help citizens and government to know the status of our water resources and ways that they can protect their quality and quantity.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student in the United States. I am currently persuing my undergraduate degree in Dietetics.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to help other people start businesses of their own and experience the reward of supporting their families while enjoying the freedom of owning thier own business!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a bridal salon and sell wedding dresses.

Lao-Tzu
